step_feedback.feedback: Great job starting in a comfortable position! Remember to place your hands on your abdomen to feel the breath.
Excellent! You're placing your hands on your abdomen. Now, get ready to inhale deeply.
Nicely done! Inhale slowly through your nose while gently tightening your muscles. Imagine the fluid moving towards your chest.
Perfect exhale! Relax your muscles as you breathe out through your mouth, visualizing pushing fluid away.
Second round, starting strong! Remember to find a comfortable seated or standing position and place hands on your abdomen.
Good job placing your hands on your abdomen again. You're all set for the deep inhale.
Excellent inhale! Keep breathing slowly through your nose and tightening your body muscles, visualizing fluid movement.
Fantastic exhale! Relax your muscles and breathe out through your mouth, imagining you're pushing fluid out.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the deep breathing exercises! Remember to inhale through your nose while tightening your body and exhale through your mouth while relaxing. This helps stimulate lymphatic flow and promotes healing.
